verses.text: Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and all the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that they might bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.\f + \fr 8.1 \ft chief: Heb. princes\f*

And all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* themselves unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* at the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* in the \w month|strong="H3391"\w* \w Ethanim|strong="H0388"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.
And all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.

And they brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and all the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, even those did the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

And \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that were \w assembled|strong="H3259"\w* unto him, \add were\add* with him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, \w sacrificing|strong="H2076"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, that could not be \w told|strong="H5608"\w* nor \w numbered|strong="H4487"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, into the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, to the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place, even\add* under the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*.

For the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* \add their\add* two \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* over the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \w covered|strong="H5526"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* and the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.

And they drew \w out|strong="H0748"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w*, that the \w ends|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* were seen \w out|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*, and they were not \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*: and there they are unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 8.8 \ft ends: Heb. heads\f*\f + \fr 8.8 \ft holy…: or, ark\f*

\add There was\add* nothing in the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w save|strong="H7535"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w put|strong="H3240"\w* there at \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \add a covenant\add* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when they came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 8.9 \ft when the: or, where the\f*

And it came to pass, when the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* were come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, that the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

So that the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*: for the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ Then \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* that he would \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the thick \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*.

I have \w surely|strong="H1129"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* thee an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to dwell \w in|strong="H2073"\w*, a settled \w place|strong="H4349"\w* for thee to abide \w in|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: (and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*;)

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and hath with his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w* \add it\add*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, I \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* no \w city|strong="H5892"\w* out of all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* might be therein; but I \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to be over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it was in the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w Whereas|strong="H3282"\w* it was in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, thou didst \w well|strong="H2895"\w* that it was in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w Nevertheless|strong="H7535"\w* thou shalt not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; but thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that shall come forth \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of thy \w loins|strong="H2504"\w*, he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, and I am risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the room of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*, and have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And I have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* there a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* for the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, wherein \add is\add* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, when he brought them \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ And \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the presence \w of|strong="H5048"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*:

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w* like thee, in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, or on \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath, who \w keepest|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* and \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* that \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee with all their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*:

Who hast \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* that thou \w promisedst|strong="H1696"\w* him: thou \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* also with thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and hast \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w* \add it\add* with thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Therefore now, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* that thou \w promisedst|strong="H1696"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There shall not \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* thee a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w so|strong="H7535"\w* that thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that they \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me as thou hast \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me.\f + \fr 8.25 \ft fail…: Heb. be cut off unto thee a man from my sight\f*\f + \fr 8.25 \ft so that: Heb. only if\f*

And now, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, let thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, I pray thee, be \w verified|strong="H0539"\w*, which thou \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

But will \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w indeed|strong="H0552"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*? behold, the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* of \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* cannot \w contain|strong="H3557"\w* thee; how much \w less|strong="H0637"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that I have \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*?

Yet have thou \w respect|strong="H6437"\w* unto the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and to his \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w cry|strong="H7440"\w* and to the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, which thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w prayeth|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*:

That thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* may be \w open|strong="H6605"\w* toward this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* and \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add even\add* toward the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of which thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall be there: that thou mayest \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* which thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* shall \w make|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.\f + \fr 8.29 \ft toward this place: or, in this place\f*

And \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* thou to the \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when they shall \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: and when thou \w hearest|strong="H8085"\w*, \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*.\f + \fr 8.30 \ft toward this place: or, in this place\f*

¶ If any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w trespass|strong="H2398"\w* against his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and an \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* be \w laid|strong="H5375"\w* upon him to cause him to \w swear|strong="H0422"\w*, and the \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:\f + \fr 8.31 \ft and an oath…: Heb. and he require an oath of him\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w condemning|strong="H7561"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and \w justifying|strong="H6663"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him according to his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

¶ When thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be smitten \w down|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, because they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, and shall turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to thee, and \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*, and make \w supplication|strong="H2603"\w* unto thee in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:\f + \fr 8.33 \ft in: or, toward\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ When \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* is shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w*, and there is no \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, because they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee; if they \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, when thou \w afflictest|strong="H6031"\w* them:

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that thou \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* them the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* wherein they should \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* upon thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

¶ If there be in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, if there be \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, \w blasting|strong="H7711"\w*, \w mildew|strong="H3420"\w*, \w locust|strong="H0697"\w*, \add or\add* if there be \w caterpiller|strong="H2625"\w*; if their \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w besiege|strong="H6887"\w* them in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w cities|strong="H8179"\w*; whatsoever \w plague|strong="H5061"\w*, whatsoever \w sickness|strong="H4245"\w* \add there be;\add*\f + \fr 8.37 \ft cities: or, jurisdiction\f*

What \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* and \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* soever be \add made\add* by any \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \add or\add* by all thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* the \w plague|strong="H5061"\w* of his own \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* toward this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4349"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, whose \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*; (for thou, \add even\add* thou only, \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* the \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* of all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*;)

That they may \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that they \w live|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Moreover concerning a \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, that \add is\add* not of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, but cometh \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of a \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* thy \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake;

(For they shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* of thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and of thy \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and of thy stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*;) when he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4349"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that the \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* to thee for: that all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee, as \add do\add* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and that they may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which I have \w builded|strong="H1129"\w*, is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 8.43 \ft this…: Heb. thy name is called upon this house\f*

¶ If thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* against their \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \w whithersoever|strong="H1870"\w* thou shalt \w send|strong="H7971"\w* them, and shall \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which thou hast \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, and \add toward\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:\f + \fr 8.44 \ft toward the city: Heb. the way of the city\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* their \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* and their \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*, and \w maintain|strong="H6213"\w* their \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 8.45 \ft cause: or, right\f*

If they \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, (for \add there is\add* no \w man|strong="H0120"\w* that \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* not,) and thou be \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with them, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them to the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, so that they carry them \w away|strong="H7617"\w* \w captives|strong="H7617"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \w far|strong="H7350"\w* or \w near|strong="H7138"\w*;
